resources.string: Please Enter the number of the Appointment You \n\t\t\t\t\t wish to edit and press EDIT button
Please Enter the number of the Appointment You \n\t\t\t\t\t wish to delete and press DELETE button
Please Enter the number of the Appointment You \n\t\t\t\t\t wish to move and press MOVE button
\t\t\t\t Enter the details that you want \n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t to Update
Please Enter a KeyWord and press SEARCH button \n\t\t\t\t\t to search Particular Appointment
